text: Allah, yini asamanasamuha o yamina srsti karechena [1], ara yini akasa hate pani barsana kare ta diye tomadera jibikara jan'ya phalamula utpadana karena ebam yini nauyanake tomadera anugata kare diyechena yate tamra nirdese segulo sagare bicarana kare ebam yini tomadera kalyane niyojita karechena nadisamuhake
